-1.1.content:
Thank you for sharing your purpose of learning, and I'm delighted to help you focus more on object classification using TensorFlow for computer vision! 🌟 Based on your background in machine learning, I can design a course plan that starts with a brief overview of TensorFlow essentials, then quickly moves into computer vision concepts. We'll dive deep into object classification, covering various architectures and models that are pivotal in this domain. 📚👓

To tailor the course perfectly to your needs, I need one last input from you. 🕒 How much time would you like to invest in learning this topic? Your desired number of hours will help me create a course of suitable length that ensures comprehensive coverage of TensorFlow for computer vision, all aligned with your background and your purpose. 🛠️✨

Please enter your desired duration in the text box below in number of hours. Remember, you can spread these hours over many days or weeks; there's no need to commit this time all at once. 🗓️⏳
